conversation.message: We have thoroughly researched your program and believe it is the absolute best fit for our child's development and our family's needs. You are our top preference, and we are committed to accepting a placement if offered. We formally apply now.

Even though I am ranked 4th by Nursery_C, I have a strong chance of being the highest-ranked applicant if B, A, and D apply elsewhere.
